description:
The course ' Learn how to talk to make people listen to you using NLP ' will teach you how to talk to people so that they listen to you with full interest . This course offers simple and effective NLP techniques to communicate and influence people better.

This course will help you identify the mode of the person so that you can use their own words to convince them by finding out their strategies . This course will also help you identify potential clients for your business and strike those deals better.

This course contains-

  • Introduction to the course
  • The V.A.K technique
  • Learn to identify people better
  • Understanding different types of people
  • What questions to ask people to know them better
  • Bonus exercise on self hypnosis
  • Summary of the course
title: Learn How To Talk To Make People Listen To You Using NLP
